Award-winning world-class convention centre. The Grand Hall seats up to 4,000 guests. Versatile spaces for lavish weddings and private functions with customizable setups, fine dining, and dedicated event planning.
Independent wedding hall in Manama. Accommodates up to 400 guests with special bride suite. Known for elegant decoration and professional event management.

Party hall in Sitra with all facilities to host weddings, birthday parties, corporate functions and all kinds of events. Multiple branches available.

An elegant tea room and patisserie located in the grounds of The Palace Boutique Hotel. The tea room can be transformed for magical ceremonies. The Secret Garden outdoor area is a beautiful wedding venue with seamless service and menu customisation.

imagePolicyNote: Main goal: ensure images render reliably in a local HTML file. For sources that block hotlinking/CORP, an image proxy (images.weserv.nl) is used as a fallback.
